DOC.brief_summary: The purpose pilot study assess impact chiropractic Activator adjustment spatial cognitive ability initial assessment test healthy population age 18 35 .
DOC.brief_title: The Impact Chiropractic Activator Adjustments Mental Rotation Line Judgment Reaction Time
DOC.detailed_description: This study seek assess impact chiropractic cognition . Participants must 18 35 year age . Within past six month individual may participate broken bone , accident , surgery spine . Additionally , participant mental disability , pregnant , condition spine bone mineral loss . Patients receive chiropractic exam randomize sham ( simulate chiropractic adjustment ) chiropractic adjustment intervention group . Prior receive either sham chiropractic adjustment , participant sit front computer screen ask follow instruction press button keypad . There three different type computer assessment take approximately fifteen minute total . After computer assessment participant receive either sham chiropractic adjustment . The chiropractic adjustment sham utilize handheld instrument call Activator . After adjustment sham participant take computer assessment . The total time may take ninety minute .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 35 In good health pregnant medically diagnose cognitive deficit medically diagnose learn disability fracture , trauma , surgery spine within past six month diagnose osteoporosis , articular instability
